pageContext.claim: “The building of the Wall on the Southern Border will bring down the crime rate throughout the entire Country!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump lives in his own reality when it comes to immigration, crime and the border. Southern border apprehensions have been declining for 20 years and are down more than 80 percent from their most recent peak in 2000. Almost all research shows legal and illegal immigrants are less likely to commit crimes than the native-born population.
